price: as a bearer of glad tidings and a warner; yet most of them turn away and they do not listen.
arabic: بَشِيرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا فَأَعۡرَضَ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ
